articles.title: TCS CEO says not seen this kind of economic uncertainty before, aims to keep order book growing - CNBCTV18
articles.description: TCS CEO K Krithivasan said when there is uncertainty on the topline front, it is only natural that the focus shifts to the margins and that the company has taken steps towards the same.

articles.title: TCS Q2 Results: With low near-term visibility, analysts expect better days only in FY25 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Of the 46 analysts that track TCS, 24 of them have a "buy" rating, 13 say "hold," while nine of them have a "sell" recommendation.

articles.title: India is a promising destination for global investors, says EY CEO Carmine Di Sibio - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Ernst & Young (EY) CEO Carmine De Sibio says India is on top of the list for global investors. Speaking to CNBC-TV18, he said there is huge appetite to invest in India and identified geopolitics as the biggest risk to global growth.
